name: Shilpa Rele
bio: Worked as an academic librarian specializing in scholarly communication, open access, research data management, and digital libraries.

name: Sarah Wipperman
bio: Worked as a Scholarly Communication Librarian specializing in publishing, copyright, and research visibility.

name: Joe McArthur
bio: Director & co-founder of OA.Works. Worked at OpenCon and SPARC.
